name: google-sheets-plugin
description: Google Sheets integration plugin for AGNT - Monitor new rows, read, write, append, and clear data in Google Sheets.
author: AGNT Team

schema.title: Google Sheets New Row
schema.description: Listen for new rows added to a specified Google Sheet and trigger the workflow when a new row is detected.

spreadsheetId.description: The ID of the Google Spreadsheet to monitor

sheetName.description: The name of the sheet within the spreadsheet to monitor

newRow.description: The data of the newly added row

schema.title: Google Sheets API
schema.description: Interact with Google Sheets to read, write, append, or clear data in a spreadsheet.

operation.description: The operation to perform on the Google Sheet

spreadsheetId.description: The ID of the Google Sheet to interact with

range.description: The range of cells to interact with (e.g., 'Sheet1!A1:B5')

values.description: Comma separated array of values to write or append (for write and append operations).

success.description: Indicates whether the Google Sheets operation was successful

result.description: The data returned by the Google Sheets operation (for read operations)

error.description: Error message if the Google Sheets operation failed
